title: Follow Up on an Uncorrected Violation
description: A code enforcement officer is following up on a citation for an overgrown lawn that has not been corrected by the deadline.

tasks.description: Identify the property with the outstanding violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer pulls up the case file for the property.

tasks.description: Perform a follow-up inspection to confirm the violation has not been corrected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer visits the property and confirms the lawn is still overgrown.

tasks.description: Issue a second, more severe citation with a fine and a new deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer issues a new citation with escalating penalties.
